scripts.compile-contracts: npx solc contracts/Articulo.sol contracts/ArticuloFactory.sol --bin --abi -o contracts/out && mv contracts/out/contracts_Articulo_sol_Articulo.abi contracts/out/Articulo.json && mv contracts/out/contracts_ArticuloFactory_sol_ArticuloFactory.abi contracts/out/ArticuloFactory.json && mv contracts/out/contracts_Articulo_sol_Articulo.bin contracts/out/Articulo.bin && mv contracts/out/contracts_ArticuloFactory_sol_ArticuloFactory.bin contracts/out/ArticuloFactory.bin
